segments.text: The sunlight streaming through the window creates a beautiful contrast with the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s hard to believe that everything outside looks so calm while this kitchen is a disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water cascading down the cabinets makes me feel a bit nauseated.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the children are so cheerful, focused on their mission for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish the woman would turn around and take notice of the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If she only knew what was happening right behind her, would she still be so calm?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It feels like a ticking time bomb waiting to explode at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR
